snippet: Coach Kyle Flood was also fined $50,000 after an investigation confirmed he had improperly contacted a faculty member in an effort to preserve a player’s eligibility.
abstract: Rutgers football Coach Kyle Flood is suspended for three games and fined $50,000 for contacting faculty member about player's academic status; Rutgers is investigating whether NCAA rules were violated.
lead_paragraph: Coach Kyle Flood was also fined $50,000 after an investigation confirmed he had improperly contacted a faculty member in an effort to preserve a player’s eligibility.

headline.main: Rutgers Suspends Football Coach for Three Games
headline.print_headline: Coach of Troubled Rutgers Is Suspended Three Games

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
